project_name: TRAXOVO âˆž Clarity Core Enterprise Intelligence Platform

project_overview.description: Advanced autonomous enterprise intelligence platform that dynamically integrates free, no-signup APIs to enhance organizational performance and data insights.
core_technologies: Mobile-responsive design with adaptive view modes
project_overview.target_interface: Clean map interface like JDD (Quantum Lead Intelligence Map) geared towards telematics data

critical_issues_encountered.primary_issue: Extreme MacBook browser cache persistence preventing frontend updates
critical_issues_encountered.manifestation: User continues to see original dashboard template despite multiple backend updates
attempted_solutions: Quantum cache eliminator and nuclear cache destroyer
Route redirections and timestamp-based cache busting
Direct template hardcoding in route handler
critical_issues_encountered.current_status: Browser cache completely overriding all backend changes

clean_map_interface_specifications.layout: Split-panel design with metrics sidebar and full map view
clean_map_interface_specifications.color_scheme: Blue gradient background (#1e3c72 to #2a5298) with teal accents (#00d4aa)

map_features.marker_types: Color-coded circle markers (green=operational, orange=maintenance, red=due maintenance)

deployment_instructions.step_1: Clone/import project files to new Replit environment
deployment_instructions.step_3: Set up PostgreSQL database with DATABASE_URL environment variable
deployment_instructions.step_4: Configure SESSION_SECRET and other required environment variables
deployment_instructions.step_6: Access via /dashboard route for clean map interface
deployment_instructions.step_7: For cache issues, use /quantum-map alternative route

known_working_solutions.backend_route: app_minimal.py dashboard() function with hardcoded HTML
known_working_solutions.template_bypass: Complete HTML embedded directly in Flask route
known_working_solutions.data_verification: EX-210013 MATTHEW C. SHAYLOR appears in console logs
known_working_solutions.map_functionality: Leaflet.js loads DFW region with telematics markers

if_old_dashboard_appears: Check developer tools console for cache messages
if_map_not_loading: Inspect browser console for JavaScript errors

success_criteria.primary: Clean map interface displaying DFW telematics data
success_criteria.secondary: EX-210013 MATTHEW C. SHAYLOR visible as primary asset
success_criteria.tertiary: Color-coded fleet markers with operational status
success_criteria.mobile: Responsive design working on iPhone/mobile devices

transfer_notes.environment_setup: PostgreSQL database required with authentic RAGLE data
immediate_priorities: Ensure clean map interface displays correctly
transfer_notes.competitive_challenge: Get clean telematics map interface working faster than parallel TRAXOVO implementation
